price: I Sunce se kreće do svog odredišta, to je odredba Silnog i Sveznajućeg.
arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wal-shamsu tajrī limus'taqarrin lahā dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
